item.title: Simulation in MATLAB of a vertical walking three-link robot
item.description: Description: This article focuses on the study, design and development of a vertical movement robot, whose task is moving along walls, adjacent planes and buildings. The real model of the robot should be presented in the Techno Park of the Bauman Moscow State Technical University. There was reviewed and proved the relevance of the studying, researching and development of vertical robots that perform a wide range of tasks in various fields.

item.title: About me
item.description: Here is a little story about mysefl: As a student of BMSTU I was guided by the principles of time management and organized every necessary task, made my own calendar to track tasks, which allowed me to get good grades and get an excellent reputation with teachers. Also I defended my diploma perfectly and I was in the lists of the best students of the faculty at the 4th year of studying.
